data.name: Euro Fishing: Foundry Dock
data.detailed_description:
Foundry Dock swaps the calm stillness of lakeside fishing for a busy city environment that isn’t your average fishing venue!

This 11-acre lake doesn’t skimp on the wildlife though, with over 400 Carp reaching up to 46lbs, Roach, Tench, and Bream, plus a number of elusive Catfish - there are plenty of new fish to target, hunt and catch.

When it comes to hunting the big fish, this venue features:
  • 20 new boss fish to try to catch
  • 10 new achievements to unlock
  • 23 different swims to choose, from undeveloped, graffiti covered walls as your backdrop to fishing in front of a luxury hotel

This is carp fishing – urban style!

data.short_description: Swap the calm stillness of lakeside fishing for a busy city environment that isn’t your average fishing venue! This 11-acre lake doesn’t skimp on the wildlife though, with plenty of new fish to target, hunt and catch.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 64bit / 8 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 1 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 460 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 64bit / 8 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
